WorkItem.Description:
All searches produce no results. On an XP machine, I was about to give up when it started to work. On a Vista machine it still doesn't work. I've checked in Windows explorer that none of the files are being blocked.
 
If I press the [Test Code] button I get an error message "Error loading file: Object reference not set to an instance of an object".
 
I get the same behaviour if I compile the source code. The exception is thrown by line 99 in Window1.xaml.cs (MessageBox.Show( int.Parse(span.InnerHtml.ToLower().Replace("downloads", string.Empty).Trim()).ToString());) as 'span' is null.
 
To confirm the bug, I use the search string as used in the GetDocLinks example (//*[@background or @lowsrc or @src or @href]) and that too results in an empty search results (however GetDocLinks appears to work)
 
Version is V1.4.0, using VS2008.
